title: Jodie Foster opens the doors to 'Hotel Artemis'
text:
Jodie Foster opens the doors to 'Hotel Artemis' 4:38am IST - 01:31
Oscar winning actress Jodie Foster talks about her return to the big screen as she attends the world premiere of 'Hotel Artemis'. Rough Cut - no reporter narration ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
